name.name: name
name.caption: Name
name.description: Give a name to this configuration so it can be later referenced by config-ref.

boolean.name: enableLanguage
boolean.caption: Enable Language
boolean.description: Enable the usage of the module in MEL.

globalRef.name: config-ref
globalRef.caption: Connector Configuration
globalRef.description: Specify which configuration to use for this invocation.

cloud-connector.caption: Signature
cloud-connector.description: Module to create Signatures and verify them .

string.name: input-ref
string.caption: Input Reference
string.description: Payload that has to be signed, needs to be a byte array.

string.name: variable
string.caption: Variable
string.description: The enricher target to store the signature.

string.name: input
string.caption: Input
string.description: Payload that has to be signed, needs to be a byte array.

string.name: key
string.caption: Key
string.description: Key used for encryption or decryption. If the keystore is defined then this value is the key stored in the keystore. If the keystore is not defined then this is taken as plain key for encryption and has to be Base64 encrypted. .

string.name: keyPassword
string.caption: Key Password
string.description: The key password to read the key stored in the keystore. If the keystore is not specified then this value is not considered..

string.name: referenceUri
string.caption: Reference Uri
string.description: Reference URI, if you wish to use an external reference URI for Detached signatures..

enum.name: canonicalizationAlgorithm
enum.caption: Canonicalization Algorithm
enum.description: Canonicalization Method For a canonicalization specification see @see{http://www.w3.org/TR/2009/WD-xmlsec-algorithms-20090226/#canonicalization-uris Accepted Values: EXCLUSIVE, EXCLUSIVE_WITH_COMMENTS, INCLUSIVE, INCLUSE_WITH_COMMENTS.

enum.name: digestMethodAlgorithm
enum.caption: Digest Method Algorithm
enum.description: Digest Method Algorithm For a reference on the Digest Method Algorithms see @see{http://www.w3.org/TR/2009/WD-xmlsec-algorithms-20090226/#digest-method-uris ACCEPTED VALUES: RIPEMD160, SHA1, SHA256, SHA512.

enum.name: signatureMethodAlgorithm
enum.caption: Signature Method Algorithm
enum.description: Signature Method Algorithm For Signature Method Algorithms specification see @see{http://www.w3.org/TR/2009/WD-xmlsec-algorithms-20090226/#encryption-method-uris Accepted Values: RSA_SHA1, DSA_SHA1, HMAC_SHA1.

enum.name: signatureType
enum.caption: Signature Type
enum.description: The encryption type ACCEPTED VALUES: DETACHED, ENVELOPED, ENVELOPING.
